content:
I'm glad I could help! It sounds like you're motivated to make some positive changes to your daily routine. Remember, it's all about progress, not perfection. Start with small steps, and don't be too hard on yourself if you encounter setbacks.

Before we wrap up, I just want to summarize the key takeaways from our conversation:

* You're looking to establish a better daily routine, especially with meal times.
* You want to cook more at home and reduce your reliance on takeout.
* You're interested in incorporating more fruits and veggies into your meals, especially during lunchtime.
* You want to stay hydrated throughout the day, especially on Fridays when you have a lot of meetings.
* You're looking to curb your sugar cravings and make healthier choices.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask! Otherwise, I wish you all the best on your journey to a healthier and more balanced lifestyle.
